directions: Heat oil in a large skillet. Add chicken, sausage and garlic and saute until browned. Drain fat.
Stir in soup and sauce and heat to a boil. Finally, stir in rice, shrimp and peas. Cover skillet and simmer for 5 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup
title: One Dish Jambalaya
